name: Wyrmsun Boats & Other For Maps
description: This is base of 21 configured boats that can be used in custom maps or attached to any faction (see HotA mod for reference)
author: Wyrmsun Developers

chinese.name: 船只与其他地图物体（Wyrmsun）
chinese.description: Wyrmsun的船只模组包，包含21种新船只和新的地图物体，这些船只可用于自定义地图或加到任何种族（参见HotA mod）。
